title: Manage VIP Suite Holder Request
description: During a game, a VIP suite holder requests extra chairs for their suite.

tasks.description: Receive the request from the suite holder via the venue's mobile app.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the request, including the suite number and number of chairs needed.

tasks.description: Check the inventory of available chairs.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms there are enough chairs in storage.

tasks.description: Dispatch a member of the event staff to deliver the chairs to the suite.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a task for the event staff and dispatches it to the nearest staff member.
